name: ANCIENT (Slinon, VnssJT, Pitarcus, HDchrom, GoragarX, Moggito)
name_original: ANCIENT (Slinon, VnssJT, Pitarcus, HDchrom, GoragarX, Moggito)
description:
Wake up, blocks...

In a remote temple there is a block that wakes up. 

Create the perfect form (1 0 0) and explore the depths of this mysterious place.

Help the blocks reach the perfect form by scratching your head in a variety of binary-inspired sokoban-style puzzles! 

Features
  • 15 fun puzzles.
  • Undo or restart at any time through in-game UI
  • Beautiful hand-drawn graphics.
  • Adaptive audio. Audio meets gameplay<3
Credits
  • Lead Programmer (HDchrom)
  • Artist & Programmer (Slinon)
  • Artists (Van JT & Moggichita)
  • Game Designer (GoragarX)
  • Sound Designer & Programmer (Pitarcus)
